title: Taisei Kensetsu: Sri Lanka Kousokudouro
synopsis: A 30-second animated commercial for the construction company Taisei. The commercial highlights the Southern and Outer Circular Expressways that Taisei built in Sri Lanka.
related_anime: ['Taisei Kensetsu: Singapore', 'Taisei Kensetsu: Vietnam Noi Bai Kuukou', 'Taisei Kensetsu: Shin Doha Kokusai Kuukou', 'Taisei Kensetsu: Bosporus Kaikyou Tunnel']
staff: [['Shinkai, Makoto', ['Director', ' Storyboard']], ['Tenmon', ['Music']], ['Urbanowicz, Mateusz', ['Background Art']], ['Tanji, Takumi', ['Background Art']]]
